item.title: 7 Tips for Starting Med School
item.description: …#7 changed my LIFE!! Lol Starting med school has been simultaneously the most exciting and the most overwhelming time of my life. Itâ€™s only been a month, and I already feel a lot of the responsibilities of â€œbeing a doctorâ€. Like Shakespeare wrote in Twelfth Night, itâ€™s kind of been thrust upon me, all of a sudden. Starting the Problem Based Learning (PBL) model here at Mac was a little analogous to being thrown into the deep end, where at least before there were familiar creatures like marked exams and projectsâ€”have now been replaced by a void of vague tutorial objectives, optional anatomy labs, and â€œprofessional competencyâ€.
